title: Emmaus and the Pattern of Redemption
itunes:title: Emmaus and the Pattern of Redemption
description: The story of the two disciples on the road to Emmaus teaches us how to see. When we listen to Christ explain the Scriptures to us, we understand the pattern of his life and death. And when we eat his body and drink his blood, we see precisely who he is: God's love made flesh.
